scripts.dev: $HOME/.nvm/versions/node/v16.4.0/bin/npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --restart-tries 0 -n LINT,CODE -c grey,blue "npm run ts-lint" "NODE_ENV=development $HOME/.nvm/versions/node/v16.4.0/bin/npx nodemon -w"
scripts.start: $HOME/.nvm/versions/node/v16.4.0/bin/npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --restart-tries 0 -n COMPILER,CODE -c grey,blue "npm run type" "npm run dev"
